content: Hey crafters welcome back this is a second bit in my zombie apocalypse
crafting series and I wanted to make some terrain that would be kind of
creepy looking and I thought it might be nice to have some piles of incinerated
bodies that you know as it hit the fan they were trying to get ready to get rid
of as many bodies as they could so they pile them up it would torch them so I
thought it'd be kind of neat to make some piles to use this terrain so let's
go the table I'll show you how I accomplished that
now I thought an addition to the table would be a nice creepy pile of
incinerated remains and so I did to start this was I did my toilet paper
technique you can see in other videos I just clumped the toilet paper so kitten
white blue and I let it harden so now it's all ready to be the pile to this
project now the second part of this project is going to be skeletons and I
got this box of skeleton warriors for war games Factory and it has a has 30
skeletons in here so it's a plenty of skeletons to use for this as well as
other projects so I was going to use these to put to this so now what I'll do
is I'll I'll put some white glue on here and then I'll glue some skeletons on and
I'll come back and show you what that looks like
so I've glued my skeleton bits to this pile and I think it'll make a nice kind
of pile of remains now I'm going to add some glue and sand to this so now that I
have all my skeletons applied to the pile I'm going to fill it in with some
sand and yeah you can see that this is this sand is a little different than
what I usually use it's place and it's just it's just
saying that doesn't have the other aggregate now the reason I'm going to
use this on the model is because I want to look like ash so I figure if I use
the the construction sand with the aggregate and it won't look as much like
ash and I'm trying to get that ash look so I'm gonna use the place and so I'll
just fill in around the skeletons with the place and and then put this on and
let it dry and paint it up now what I'm going to do to paint it is I'm just
going to paint it black and then I'm going to dry brush it with a very light
grey a very whitish grey and that'll kind of give it the ash look
so now we'll come back to the table I'll show you what the the completed pile
looks like so here's our finished ash pile and I
think it's a really grisly decor for the game and let me give you a closer look
so you can see some of the details so you can see some of those skeletons in
there and how that place and really made it look like ash as opposed to all
different kinds of debris in the pile so I think that really came out nice and
creepy and I'll see you next time on the craft hey crafters I hope you've enjoyed
this episode of the DMS craft make sure to subscribe and I have tons of other
videos as you can see I am the originator of the 2.5 D method of
crafting tiles I also do dirt cheap terrain for the table if all this
intrigues you make sure you check out all the videos below also join my forum
we have lots of great crafters on there who give advice I have a link above and
below and last but not least remember go forth and craft
